name: Pressing Space Bar on "GO" (in a DM/GM)  carries out the action

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)
customFields.Cypress Reports: MISSING - TM4J-Key-Missing-In-Cypress - TM4J key NOT found in any Cypress run reports  (SDET/QA)

inline.description:
Pressing Space Bar on "GO" (in a DM/GM) carries out the action
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Use CTRL+F6/F6 to navigate to the channel sidebar region then down arrow to navigate to DIRECT MESSAGES
  2. TAB so that focus is on the "+" to the right of DIRECT MESSAGES
  3. Press Enter to open the modal
  4. Type the name of a user/users you want to add
  5. Use the down/up arrows to select the user then press Enter
  6. Use TAB to set focus on the GO button
  7. Press Space Bar
inline.expectedResult: • The DM/GM should be created and you should be directed to that channel

customFields.Related ticket(s):
• ADA: Screen reader reads 'Press space to activate' on Add button of Add Members to channel button when space doesn't trigger the button — MM-17094
  • (Task) Accessibility Cypress Test Automation: Accessibility Support in Modals & Dialogs — MM-22623
